availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Gray. Father of Brown Gray and Francis Gray. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 559.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 118A.
"James Harvey Gray (1822-1878)," Find A Grave, Memorial #43076668, accessed September 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43076668.
